Title: Created db SqlTest (sqls in repo). Backup to .bak file.

Codes.CodeFormat:
SELECT p.[Id],p.[Name],p.[Surname],p.[IdNumber],p.[DateOfBirth]
FROM [dbo].[Person] p
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Address] a
ON p.Id = a.PersonId
WHERE a.Id IS NULL;

Title: Unique name of person who are born during july, august.

Codes.CodeFormat:
SELECT DISTINCT n, m FROM
(SELECT [Name] as n, MONTH([DateOfBirth]) as m
FROM [dbo].[Person])
AS data WHERE m IN ('7','8')

Title: Show one record with addres type witch is used the most and count of it used.

Codes.CodeFormat:
select Top(1)
at.Name,
count(*) as c
FROM Address a
INNER JOIN AddressType at
ON a.AddressTypeId = at.Id
GROUP BY at.Name
ORDER BY c DESC;
